name: Giants: Citizen Kabuto

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Giants - Citizen Kabuto/Giants.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /verysilent /RESTARTEXITCODE=0 /SP- /NORESTART /NOICONS /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
      /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
